data.name: Anti Pill Plush Fleece Fabric Solids
data.description:
Upgrade Your Projects with Anti Pill Plush Fleece Fabric Solids

Experience the ultimate in softness with our Anti Pill Plush Fleece Fabric Solids. This upgraded version of anti-pill fleece is made of micro-fine polyester and Drawn Texturized Yarn (DTY) filament, resulting in a super fluffy handfeel. Not only is it incredibly soft and warm, but it also offers good air permeability, making it perfect for a variety of projects.

Whether you're looking to create a winter thermal blanket by sewing it together with Sherpa fabric, this plush fleece is the perfect choice. It can also be used to make loungewear, pillows, and leisure coats. With a pill-resistant finish, you can be sure that your projects will look great for years to come.

Product Details

  • Width: 58 Inches
  • Content: 100% Polyester
  • Care: Machine wash normal cold, Non-chlorine bleach, Tumble dry low, Do not iron
  • Imported

data.name: Buffalo Check Anti Pill Plush Fleece Fabric
data.description:
Stay Stylish with Buffalo Check Anti Pill Plush Fleece Fabric

Experience the epitome of softness and style with our Buffalo Check Anti-Pill Plush Fleece Fabric. This fabric is crafted with impeccable attention to detail, ensuring longevity with its anti-pill finish. Whether you're envisioning comfy jackets, snug blankets, decorative pillows, or other winter essentials, this fleece is your go-to choice. Its classic patterns and contemporary colors make it a versatile addition to any fabric collection.

Our Buffalo Check Anti Pill Plush Fleece Fabric is perfect for creating a warm and inviting atmosphere in your home. The soft and plush texture will keep you warm and comfortable during the colder months. The classic buffalo check pattern adds a touch of rustic charm to any project, making it perfect for creating comfy blankets, decorative pillows, and more.

Product Details

  • Width: 58 inches
  • Content: 100% Polyester
  • Care: Machine

data.name: Eddie Bauer Black Plaid Anti Pill Fleece Fabric
data.description:
Eddie Bauer Black Plaid Anti Pill Fleece Fabric

Upgrade your anti-pill fleece game with Eddie Bauer's Black Plaid Anti Pill Fleece Fabric. This fabric is made of micro-fine polyester and Drawn Texturized Yarn (DTY) filament which provides a super fluffy handfeel. The fabric is soft, warm, and comfortable, making it perfect for a summer blanket or sewn together with Sherpa fabric for a winter thermal blanket. It can also be used for loungewear, pillows, and leisure coats. The black plaid pattern adds a touch of sophistication to any project.

  • Width: 58 inches

data.name: White & Brown Oil Slick Anti Pill Fleece Fabric
data.description:
Stay Cozy and Stylish with White & Brown Oil Slick Anti Pill Fleece Fabric

Looking for a comfortable and fashionable fabric for your next project? Look no further than our White & Brown Oil Slick Anti Pill Fleece Fabric! Made with 100% polyester, this fabric is both soft and durable, ensuring that your finished product will last for years to come. With a unique oil slick design in shades of white and brown, this fabric is perfect for creating cozy blankets, warm jackets, and stylish accessories.

Not only is this fabric stylish and comfortable, but it is also easy to care for. Simply machine wash on a normal cold cycle, use nonchlorine bleach if needed, and tumble dry on low. Do not iron to keep the fabric looking its best. Imported for your convenience.

Product Details

  • Width: 58 inches
  • Content: 100% Polyester
  • Care: Machine wash normal cold, nonchlorine bleach, tumble dry low, do not iron
  • Imported

data.name: Neutral Abstract Print Anti Pill Plush Fleece Fabric
data.description:
Experience the Ultimate Comfort with Our Neutral Abstract Print Anti Pill Plush Fleece Fabric

Upgrade your crafting game with our Anti Pill Plush Fleece Fabric, now available in a stunning neutral abstract print. Made with micro-fine polyester and Drawn Texturized Yarn (DTY) filament, this fabric is ultra-soft, warm, and comfortable, making it the perfect choice for a variety of projects. Whether you're looking to create a summer blanket or a winter thermal blanket by sewing it together with Sherpa fabric, this Anti Pill Plush Fleece Fabric is the perfect choice. It can also be used to create loungewear, pillows, and leisure coats, making it a versatile addition to your crafting supplies.

Product Details

  • Width: 58 inches
  • Content: 100% Polyester
  • Care: Machine Wash Normal Cold, Tumble Dry Low, Nonchlorine Bleach, Do Not Iron
  • Imported
